00001 package se.kth.md.simulinkExchange.conversion.simulink;
00002 
00003 import se.kth.md.simulinkExchange.management.exceptions.InvalidModelException;
00004 import se.kth.md.simulinkExchange.management.simulink.SimulinkModelManager;
00005        
00006 import Simulink.Model;
00007 import Simulink.SimulinkFactory;
00008 import Simulink.System;
00009 
00016 public class SimulinkDemoModelCreator {
00017 
00018         String pathName = "testWorkspace/demo.simulink";
00019         SimulinkModelManager modelManager;
00020         SimulinkEcoreCreator simulinkEcoreCreator;
00021         System root;
00022         
00023         public static void main(String [] args) {
00024                 SimulinkDemoModelCreator mc = new SimulinkDemoModelCreator();
00025                 mc.getNewModelAndNewFile();
00026                 mc.createF1System();
00027                 mc.createF2System();
00028                 mc.createF3System();
00029                 mc.createF2Subsystems();
00030                 mc.createLines();
00031                 mc.save();
00032         }
00033 
00034         private void save() {
00035                 try {
00036                         Model theModel = simulinkEcoreCreator.getTopElement();
00037                         modelManager.setTopElement( theModel );
00038                         modelManager.validateIt();
00039                         modelManager.saveIt();
00040                 } catch (InvalidModelException e) {
00041                         java.lang.System.out.println( e.getMessage() );
00042                 } catch (Exception e) {
00043                         e.printStackTrace();
00044                 }
00045         }
00046 
00047         private void createLines() {
00048                 System f1 = simulinkEcoreCreator.findSystem("F1");
00049                 System f2 = simulinkEcoreCreator.findSystem("F2");
00050                 System f3 = simulinkEcoreCreator.findSystem("F3");
00051                 simulinkEcoreCreator.addLineBetween("L1", f1, f2, root);
00052                 simulinkEcoreCreator.addLineBetween("L2", f2, f3, root);
00053                 System f21 = simulinkEcoreCreator.findSystem("F21");
00054                 System f22 = simulinkEcoreCreator.findSystem("F22");
00055                 simulinkEcoreCreator.addLineBetween("L3", f21, f22, f2);
00056         }
00057 
00058         private void createF1System() {
00059                 System sys = simulinkEcoreCreator.addSystem("F1", root);
00060                 simulinkEcoreCreator.addOutPort("F1Out", sys);
00061         }
00062 
00063         private void createF2System() {
00064                 System sys = simulinkEcoreCreator.addSystem("F2", root);
00065                 simulinkEcoreCreator.addOutPort("F2Out", sys);
00066                 simulinkEcoreCreator.addInPort("F2In", sys);
00067         }
00068         
00069         private void createF2Subsystems() {
00070                 System f2 = simulinkEcoreCreator.findSystem("F2");
00071                 System sys = simulinkEcoreCreator.addSystem("F21", f2);
00072                 simulinkEcoreCreator.addOutPort("F21Out", sys);
00073                 simulinkEcoreCreator.addInPort("F21In", sys);
00074 
00075                 sys = simulinkEcoreCreator.addSystem("F22", f2);
00076                 simulinkEcoreCreator.addOutPort("F22Out", sys);
00077                 simulinkEcoreCreator.addInPort("F22In", sys);
00078         }
00079 
00080         private void createF3System() {
00081                 System sys = simulinkEcoreCreator.addSystem("F3", root);
00082                 simulinkEcoreCreator.addOutPort("F3Out", sys);
00083                 simulinkEcoreCreator.addInPort("F3In", sys);
00084         }
00085         
00086         private void getNewModelAndNewFile() {
00087                 modelManager = new SimulinkModelManager(pathName);
00088                 SimulinkFactory factory = modelManager.getFactory();
00089                 simulinkEcoreCreator = new SimulinkEcoreCreator( factory );     
00090                 simulinkEcoreCreator.newModel("York");
00091                 root = simulinkEcoreCreator.addRootSystem("RootSys");
00092         }
00093 }
